attributes.action: Make Unemployed people with wealth pay council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many so called unemployed I know have plasma TV's and wall to wall DVD's etc. The Council pays their rents and council tax under the present system. I want the councils to do their duty as landlords and visit each property they give free rents for. Then they should calculate a unemployed persons assets and charge them a appropriate amount towards paying council tax, also they should not get their full rents paid. Obvious examples of wealth would be sky TV, Broadband , mobile phones, vehicles, tools etc.
